text: @JohnJCrace @mikegalsworthy What the hell is air bridge? it be more appropriate to call it Fast Track Boris Corona Bridge? seems @BorisJohnson isn't satisfied orchestrating excess of 60,000 #COVID19  deaths and seeks extra tally in other countries! wondering if #CummingsTheVirusSpreader is super genocidal!
